docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, May 31 -- The United States threw its support today behind a Brazilian proposal to set up a three-man committee of prominent diplomats to seek a political solution of the Dominican crisis.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, May 31 -- The United States threw its support today behind a Brazilian proposal to set up a three-man committee of prominent diplomats to seek a political solution of the Dominican crisis.
docs.abstract: US backs Brazilian plan to set up com of Min Leitao de Cunha (Brazil), Bunker and Amb Facio (CR) as pol advisers to Mora; Rusk, Leitao and Min Sapena (Paraguay) discuss plan, OAS meeting, Washington; Argentine approval seen crucial; Chile, Venezuela and Uruguay critical; reptdly fear precedent for future OAS intervention; US seeks prominent Latin-Amer mediators acceptable to both sides

headline.main: U.S. Presses O.A.S. to Send Peace Panel to Help Mora; U.S. PRESSES O.A.S. ON PEACE MISSION

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Wednesday, June 2 -- The Organization of American States, in a renewed attempt to resolve the Dominican crisis, voted early today to send a three-man committee to Santo Domingo to mediate the political dispute.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Wednesday, June 2 -- The Organization of American States, in a renewed attempt to resolve the Dominican crisis, voted early today to send a three-man committee to Santo Domingo to mediate the political dispute.
docs.abstract: OAS, 15-2, votes to send 3-man mediation com; Bunker, Ambs Clairmont Duenas (Salvador) and Marinho (Brazil) seen likely members; com link with Mora not defined

headline.main: U.S. Will Be a Member; O.A.S. Votes a 3-Man Team To Mediate Dominican Dispute

docs.snippet: The U.S. press has allowed to go unchallenged the unjustified attack by militant Senators on the Venezuelan Government for failing to show the alacrity of the Honduran and Brazilian Governments in cooperating in Operation Santo Domingo.
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. press has allowed to go unchallenged the unjustified attack by militant Senators on the Venezuelan Government for failing to show the alacrity of the Honduran and Brazilian Governments in cooperating in Operation Santo Domingo.
docs.abstract: Prof Hilton defends Latin-Amer govts that hesitate to back US, lr

headline.main: Reaction in Latin America to U.S. Action

docs.snippet: Latin-Amer conf on solidarity with Cuba and Dominican Repub shifted to Santiago from Montevideo because of Uruguayan opposition

keywords.value: AMERICAN NATIONS AND WESTERN HEMISPHERE POSSESSIONS

docs.snippet: In Vietnam last week the tempo of the fighting picked up, with South Vietnamese forces taking several bad beatings. At the same time, the Communist governments were talking tougher and seemed to be moving farther away from negotiations.
docs.lead_paragraph: In Vietnam last week the tempo of the fighting picked up, with South Vietnamese forces taking several bad beatings. At the same time, the Communist governments were talking tougher and seemed to be moving farther away from negotiations.
